title: Gamification-Based Elementary English Numeracy Education Design for [Large-Scale] Deployment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary and numerical literacy skills
context.additional_context: Providing a simulation environment for pre-service teachers to train in elementary English number pedagogy using smartphone-based gamification tools.

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies to generate interest in number games by applying the ARCS motivational model.
Learners can accurately repeat English number pronunciations and spellings from 1 to 100 at least three times using gamification elements.
Learners can implement and evaluate the effectiveness of a learner-adaptive number quiz system in a simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
